Events that occurred on 21 February.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1907 – Author, and good friend of Tolkien, W.H. Auden is born.
1932 - Scholar John Ellison is born.
1935 – Author and letter receiver Richard A. Lupoff is born.
1946 – Voice actor Anthony Daniels is born.
1958 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 205.
1963 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Mrs Gill.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring travels south down the Anduin.
